article.title: Fresno U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the Fresno U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​Fresno Office Contact Information

Glen Roberts, USEAC Director

Fresno U.S. Export Assistance Center
5245 N. Backer Avenue M/S PB5
Fresno, CA 93740
Phone: 559 348-9859
Fax: 559 278-6964
Email: Glen.Roberts@trade.gov​​​

If you live in the Fresno/Bakersfield area and would like to learn how the U.S. Commercial Service can help your company expand internationally, give me a call!

Biography:

My professional experience began with 3M while attending college. Since this time I have always worked in the international department of a firm. My experience with an international freight forwarder and logistics firm provided an exceptional perspective for international trade. Letter of credits, State department licenses and hazardous materials were part of my normal routine.

I am currently employed by the U.S. Dept. of Commerce providing export business consulting. My current activities include exporting, economic development, training, & renewable energy and alternative fuels industry sector.

I've been recognized by industry as a top leader by the International Green Industrial Hall of Fame.

Specialties:

International finance solutions, export market research, international contract law, partner match making, export regulations and renewable energy.

Certifications/Awards:

U.S. Department of Commerce Award
Beta Gamma Sigma Award
Congressional Letter of Recommendation
NASBITE Certified Global Business Professional (C.G.B.P.) Credential

Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.
